card.title: You're about to establish a connection with the issuer below.
card.credentials-description: These credentials will be presented to the chosen issuer for verification purposes.
card.confirmation-description: By hitting "confirm", the issuer will be notified of your connection request.

errors.fetching-credentials: There was an error fetching your credentials. Please try again later.
errors.connection-request: There was an error sending your connection request. Please try again later.
errors.issuer-details: There was an error loading the issuer details. Please try again later.
